overview: Joanna Angel, Jessie Lee, and Kleio are three ninjas who all individually posses something very special; Joanna has the iron ass. . . Jessie Lee carries the dragon tits. . . and Kleio owns the lotus pussy. Together, they are the only ones who hold the power to seek vengeance on the evil Emperor, Deen Wang. Through proper ninja traning - and some fucking-and-sucking along the way - these three slutty ninjas can - and will - kick some ass!
title: Kung Fu Pussy
